K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:452b-0: @452b ;;rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:452b-1: zhus chen gyi lo tstsha ba bande de ye shes sdes ba sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453a-1: ma ga dh'a aa ba d'a na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453a-3: ma ga dha bzang mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453a-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453a-7: de nas de'i tshe mnyan yod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453a-8: mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu mo ma ga dha bzang mo zhes bya ba dad pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453a-11: bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa zhig gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453a-12: ji tsam na bu ram shing 'phel zhes bya ba'i grong khyer na tshong dpon gzhan zhig gnas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453a-13: de'i bu khyu mchog byin zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453a-14: de yang gzhan mu stegs pa sten pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453a-15: gcer bu pa rnams la mngon par dad pa zhig gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453a-16: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul chen po rnam par bstan pa de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453a-17: mu stegs pa rnams mtha' 'khor tu kun tu gnas te; la la ni grong khyer bzang byed ces bya ba na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453a-18: la la ni mud gi ri ka zhes bya ba'i yul na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453a-19: la la ni bu ram shing 'phel zhes bya ba'i grong khyer na gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453a-21: khyu mchog byin de'i bar du khyim ma byas ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453a-22: de la gcer bu pa rnams kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453a-23: mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu mo ma ga dha bzang mo zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-3: skye bo dam pa rnams dang 'dra ba zhig yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-4: ji srid des thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-5: bdag nyid gcer bu pa'i cha byad du byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-7: ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du slong ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-8: des bu mo de mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-9: mthong ba'i mod kho na la bu mo de la kun tu chags par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-10: de der bslangs pa'i phye zhva'i nang du blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-11: de nas bu mo des log par spyod pa de mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-12: 'di ni shes bzhin med par slongs mo len to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-14: de nas khyu mchog byin de ngo tsha bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-15: bu ram shing 'phel gyi grong khyer du song ste pha la smras nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-16: des bu mo de bslangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-17: mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-19: gzhan du na gang gi tshe ma ga dha bzang mo 'di bu ram shing 'phel du song na rab tu byung ba rnams kyi bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-20: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-21: yang ji srid cig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis nye du rnams la yang go bar byas nas byin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-22: bu ram shing 'phel du khyer ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-23: ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig gi tshe khyim de na gcer pu pa rnams zan za ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-24: de la sgyug mos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-25: de ring bdag cag gi khyim na mchod gnas rnams bshos gsol gyi tshur shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:453b-26: mchod gnas rnams la ltos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-1: ga dha bzang mos de thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-5: yid bde ba skyes te bsams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-6: nges par btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-7: mo'u dag la gyi bu chen po la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams byon par gyur to snyam nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-8: de yid rab tu dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-9: 'jigs pa med par song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-10: gcer bu nags kyi ma he 'dra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-12: phug ron gyi phru gu 'dra ba'i gcer bu pa rnams mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-14: de'i mod la ma ga dha bzang mo ngo tsha ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-15: de gdong gzhan du bltas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-16: de la sgyug mo des smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-18: khyod ci'i phyir yi mug par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-20: gang 'di lta bu mchod gnas yin na mchod gnas ma yin pa go ji lta bu zhig yod par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-23: khyod la 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa 'ga' zhig yod dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-25: bdag gi pha'i gtsug lag khang rgyal byed kyi tshal na sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i ston pa bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-27: mi rgyu ba'i 'jig rten gyi mchod gnas yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-28: khyod kyi ston pa de ci 'dra ba zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-30: bdag gi ston pa btso ma'i tshogs ltar ser //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-31: btso ma gser ltar shin tu dri ma med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-32: tshul khrims rnam dag shes rab shin tu dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454a-33: 'jig rten gsum na mnyam med 'gro las 'phags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-0: @454b de thos ma thag tu sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-2: nged cag rnams la bcom ldan 'das de sang bstan par nus sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-3: ma ga dha bzang mos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-4: bshos gtsang rnams sbyor cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-5: sang bcom ldan 'das spyan drang bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-6: ci tsam na de rnams kyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-7: bshos gtsang rnams sbyar gyi khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das sang spyan drongs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-8: de nas ma ga dha bzang mos khang pa'i yang thog gi steng du mngon par 'dzegs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-9: phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i sa der thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-11: me tog rnams 'thor zhing spos kyang btul nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-12: gser gyi bum pa'i chus bcom ldan 'das spyan drang ba'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-13: gser gyi bum pa'i chu yang sbrengs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-14: snying rje ba'i tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-16: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-17: bdag ni ri dvags dang 'dra bar gyur cing mtha' 'khob na mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-18: dkon mchog gsum dang bral bar gyur pa la rjes su gzung bar mdzad cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-19: dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par 'dir gshegs par mdzad du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-20: yang 'di skad ces kyang smras te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-21: tshul khrims rnam dag shes rab shin tu dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-22: dad ldan snying po nyan thos che rnams kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-23: mgon med gyur ba bdag la rjes bzung ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:454b-24: don mdzad thugs rjes gshegs par mdzad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455a-3: gser gyi bum pa'i chu 'ang nam mkha' la 'phags par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyang de'i tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455a-5: 'khor rnam pa bzhi la chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455a-6: gser gyi bum pa'i chu de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bee d'urya'i sdong bu bzhin du rnam par gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455a-7: me tog de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa bzhin du gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455a-9: spos kyang sprin brtsegs pa bzhin du gnas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455a-10: de nas de mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455a-11: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455a-13: bcom ldan 'das spyan 'dren pa 'di ga las mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455a-16: dpag tshad brgya drug cu rtsa gsum na bu ram shing 'phel gyi grong khyer yod pa nas 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455a-18: grong khyer de ni mu stegs pa rnams kyis bzung ba yin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455a-19: rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pas 'gro bar bya'o zhes dge slong rnams la tshul shing brims shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455a-20: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgan pa'i gnas mtha' nas bzung nas tshul shing brims te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455a-22: sang bu ram shing 'phel gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455a-23: grong khyer de ni mu stegs pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455b-0: khyed @455b cag rnams las gang rdzu 'phrul thob pa des tshul shing long zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455b-1: ji srid cig na rgan pa'i mtha' nas tshul shing len par brtsams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455b-2: yang de na p'u ra nu kun da au da pa da na zhes bya ba'i gnas brtan yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455b-3: de yang rdzu 'phrul ma thob par lag pa brkyang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455b-4: tshul shing len par brtsams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455b-5: de la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455b-6: gnas brtan mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du 'jug pa ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455b-7: gzhan du na dpag tshad brgya drug cu rtsa gsum na bu ram shing 'phel zhes bya ba'i gnas yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455b-10: ngas ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas goms pa'i nyon mongs ni spangs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455b-11: mu stegs pa rnams dang thun mong du gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul lta zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455b-12: dka' ba ci zhig yod nas bskyed par mi bya snyam nas des kyang dus de nyid du rdzu 'phrul bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455b-13: ji srid du tshul shing gnyis pa ma brims pa de srid du des glang po che'i sna 'dra ba'i lag pa brkyang ste tshul shing blangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455b-14: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455b-16: gang gi rdzu 'phrul gang thob pa des bu ram shing 'phel zhes bya ba'i grong khyer du 'gro bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455b-17: de nas nyi ma gnyis pa la nam nangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:455b-18: dge slong rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pas yang dag par chas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456a-0: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi yang mnyan yod gang na ba der mngon @456a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456a-2: ci tsam na bar skabs der kun shes koondi n+ya zhes bya ba rta'i shing rta la zhon te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456a-3: glog 'gyur ba'i snang ba ston cing dal bus char rab tu 'babs te; de lta bu'i rang gi rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston cing 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456a-4: de nas ma ga dha bzang mo'i bdag pos de mthong ba dang dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456a-6: 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456a-7: des smras pa; 'di ni kun shes koondi n+ya zhes bya ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456a-8: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo dang po bskor ba na 'dis thog mar bdag med pa mngon sum du byas pa de thog mar 'ongs pa 'di yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456a-9: bar skabs der gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos brag gi ri chen po shing sna tshogs pa rnam pa brgyas khyab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456a-10: bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456a-11: me tog sna tshogs yang dag par khebs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456a-12: g-ya' chu sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456a-14: steng gi nam mkha' las 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456a-15: de nas khyim bdag des de mthong na smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456a-17: 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456a-19: 'di ni 'od srung chen po zhes bya ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas par smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu gsungs pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456a-21: 'dis gcig gis ma tshang ba'i glang dor stong bor zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456a-22: ser skya bzang mo skye bo dge ba rnams dang mtshungs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-0: gser @456b mang po mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin spangs nas mngon par byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-1: rab tu byung ba de ni 'ong ba 'di yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-2: bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus seng ge'i shing rta mngon par sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-3: steng gi nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-4: de nas khyim bdag des de mthong ba dang bris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-6: gang seng ge'i shing rtas 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-8: 'di ni dge slong sh'a ri'i bu zhes bya ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-10: 'di ma'i mngal du zhugs pa tsam gyis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-11: 'dzam bu gling thams cad kyi rtsod par smra ba rnams las rgyal bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-15: chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su skor ba de ni seng ge'i shing rtas 'ongs pa 'di yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-16: de'i rjes thogs nyid la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-17: glang po ches srung 'dra ba'i glang po che'i rgyal por sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-18: steng gi nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-19: de nas khyim bdag des de mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-20: ma ga dha bzang mo la bris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-21: gang glang po ches srung 'dra ba'i glang pos 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-23: 'di ni dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po zhes bya ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:456b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457a-1: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang rkang pa'i mthe bos kun tu bsgul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457a-2: 'dis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457a-3: nye dga' bo gnyis btul ba de; glang po'i shing rtas 'ong ba 'di yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457a-4: bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi padma thams cad gser las byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457a-6: dngul gyi ge sar dang ldan par mngon par sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457a-7: rdzu 'phrul gyi nam mkha' las 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457a-8: de nas khyim bdag des de mthong ba dang dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457a-10: 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457a-12: 'di ni dge slong ma 'gags pa zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457a-14: 'di ni bsod nams kyi stobs kyis yongs su bzung bas snod tshol bas gang ba lnga brgya sgo na gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457a-15: cung zad bsams pa tsam gyis chos gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457a-19: yo byad rnams 'byung ba la spyod pa de padma'i shing rtas 'ongs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457a-20: bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa gang pos nam mkha' lding gi shing rta mngon par sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457a-21: rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' las 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457a-22: de nas khyim bdag des dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457a-24: nam mkha' lding gi shing rtas 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-0: @457b 'di ni dge slong gang po zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos ston pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-2: de nam mkha' lding gi shing rtas 'ong ba 'di yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-3: bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa rta thul spyod lam rab tu zhi bas 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-4: de nas khyim bdag des de la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-6: gang lhung bzed lag na thogs te spyod lam rab tu zhi bas 'ong ba de khyod kyi ston pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-7: des de la smras pa; 'di ni dge slong rta thul zhes bya ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-8: 'di'i spyod lam rab tu zhi bas glang po che smyon pa btul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-9: 'di'i spyod lam rab tu zhi bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-10: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bus bden pa mthong bar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-11: de mngon par byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-12: rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa de spyod lam rab tu zhi bas 'ong ba 'di yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-13: bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis gser gyi ta la'i nags mngon par sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-14: rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' la 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-15: de nas khyim bdag des de la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-16: ma ga dha bzang mo; gang gser gyi ta la'i nags la rten cing 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-18: 'di ni dge slong nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu ston pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-20: 'di la sh'akya lnga brgya tsam rab tu byung ba rnams kyis do shal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:457b-23: gser gyi gdugs la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458a-0: @458a *// gos rnams kyi phung po chen po mdun du bzhag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458a-1: 'dis de mthong ba dang skyo ba chen po skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458a-2: de dag thams cad mi rtag par shes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458a-4: rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa de gser gyi ta la'i nags la rten nas 'ong ba 'di yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458a-5: de nas bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa ka ta ya na'i bu chen pos bee d'urya'i khang pa brtsegs pa mngon par sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458a-6: rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458a-7: de nas khyim bdag gis dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458a-9: bee d'urya'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug ste 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458a-11: 'di ni dge slong ka ta ya na'i bu chen po zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458a-12: bye brag du smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bee d'urya'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du 'dug nas 'ong ba 'di yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458a-13: bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa gsus po ches khyu mchog gi shing rta mngon par sprul nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458a-14: rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' las 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458a-15: de nas khyim bdag des de la dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458a-17: khyu mchog gi shing rta la zhon te 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458a-19: 'di ni dge slong gsus po che zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa thob pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458b-0: khyu mchog gi shing rtas 'ong ba 'di yin @458b no; ;bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa srung dbang gi bu ngang pa'i shing rtas steng gi nam mkha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458b-1: de nas khyim bdag des dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458b-3: gang ngang pa'i shing rtas 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458b-5: 'di ni dge slong srung dbang gi bu zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis snying rje la gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de 'di yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458b-6: 'di ni chu bo gangg'a brgal bar 'dod pa na bzang mo 'dug cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458b-8: tshig de'i rjes thogs nyid la ri bo rtsegs pa bzhin du gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458b-9: rnam pa thams cad du mi 'bab par byed pa de ngang pa'i shing rtas 'ong ba 'di yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458b-10: bar skabs der tshe dang ldan pa rna ba bye ba nyi shu ri nags kyi tshogs la 'chag cing 'dug pa de 'chag bzhin du 'ong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458b-11: de nas khyim bdag des dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458b-13: gang nags shing brgya dag gis khyab pa'i nags 'di la 'chag cing 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458b-15: 'di ni dge slong rna ba can zhes bya ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458b-17: 'di skyes pa tsam gyis rna ba bye ba nyi shu ri ba dang bcas par skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458b-18: gang gi rkang mthil gyi 'og nas sor bzhi tsam gyi gser gyi spu yang dag par skyes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458b-19: gang 'di dang po'i zan la k'arsha pa na lnga brgya zad par byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:458b-20: gang bcom ldan 'das snyung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-0: mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bshos gtsang nye bar blangs pa @459a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-2: gang gi dris 'od ma'i tshal thams cad kun tu gang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-3: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mnams nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-4: mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-5: gang gi rkang pa gnyis bzhag pa tsam gyis sa 'di rab tu g-yos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-6: gang zhig rab tu byung nas 'chag pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-7: de'i rkang pa gnyis las khrag byung ba zag pa khva rnams 'thung ba de 'chag cing 'ong ba 'di yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-8: bar skabs der tshe dang dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha lugs su mngon par sprul te 'ong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-9: de nas khyim bdag des dris pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-11: gang 'di 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha byad kyis 'ong ba 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-13: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras bcom ldan 'das kyi bslab pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-14: 'dis yab kyi spangs pa'i dpal ston par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-15: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha lugs kyis rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa bu stong gis yongs su bskor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-18: skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'i zla ba lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-19: rgyal po'i lam bzung nas 'gro ba mi'i bdag po lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-20: chu bo stong phrag gi chu 'bab pas kun tu 'gengs pa'i rgya mtsho lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-23: mya ngan sel pa'i skye dgu skyong ba chen po lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-24: ri dvags kyi nang na seng ge lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459a-25: bya rnams kyi nang na nam mkha' lding lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-0: thams cad sel ba'i @459b nyi ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-1: gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-2: chos bzang na mig stong dang ldan pa chos skyong ba lta bur 'ong ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-3: de bzhin du la la ni 'bar bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-4: la la ni char 'bebs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-5: de bzhin du cho 'phrul sna tshogs pa ston cing 'ong ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-6: la la sa las 'phags pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-7: la la nam mkha'i gzhi la gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-8: la la stan ni sprul byed de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-9: rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mthu la ltos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-10: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma rnams yang dag par song ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gang gis 'dzam bu gling thams cad gser btse ma'i mdog 'dra ba'i 'od kyis gang ba de lta bu'i 'od bkye zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-13: bu ram shing 'phel gyi bar 'di 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkye bas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-14: gang du yang mig gis mi mthong ba med pas thams cad kyis mthong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyang nam mkha' la gshegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-16: lag na rdo rje ni snam logs nas 'greng ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-17: gnas gtsang ma pa rnams ni steng nas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-18: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams ni 'og nas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-19: g-yon logs nas ni brgya byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-21: de bzhin du gtsug phud lnga pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-23: mig sbyin la sogs pa'i dri za rnams pi wang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:459b-26: rdza rnga la sogs pa rol mo'i bye brag snyan pa rnams brdung zhing me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460a-0: phreng ba rnams kyang 'thor zhing 'byor pa chen pos gshegs @460a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460a-2: bar skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis srog chags stong phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun bden pa la thog mar rab tu bkod pa mdzad nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460a-3: de'i 'og tu bu ram shing 'phel gyi grong khyer du gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460a-4: grong khyer de na yang sgo bco brgyad yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460a-5: der bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas bco brgyad bco brgyad sprul par mdzad nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460a-6: sgo re re zhing sangs rgyas snang bar gyur pa nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460a-7: bcom ldan 'das ma ga dha bzang mo'i khyim du gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460a-8: de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma mthong ste; de nas khros nas de'i khyim bshig par brtsams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer de thams cad shel gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460a-10: gang khyim thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyis ku bzhugs par mthong bar mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460a-11: ji srid du bu ram shing 'phel du ma ga dha bzang mo la sogs pa'i srog chags brgya stong du ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460a-14: spos rnams kyis mchod par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma ga dha bzang mo la sogs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs chen po de rnams la gang zhig thos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460a-16: ma ga dha bzang mo la sogs pa'i srog chags brgya stong du ma rnams kyis bden pa mngon du mthong ba thob par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-0: @460b 'khor de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-3: yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-4: the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-6: ji srid du ma ga dh'a bzang mo mchis nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-7: srog chags brgya stong du ma mtho ris dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-8: thar pa la gzhol bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-9: 'dis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis pa ni ngo mtshar che'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-11: da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-12: 'das pa'i dus na 'dis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas pa de nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-14: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-15: skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-16: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-22: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-24: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-25: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-26: yang dus de'i de'i tshe grong khyer w'a ra na si na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-27: rgyal po kram kr'i zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-28: de'i bu mo gser gyi phreng ba dang ldan pa zhig btsas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-29: de'i ming yang gser phreng zhes bya bar btags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-30: ji srid cig na bu mo de cher skyes par gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:460b-31: na zla gzhon nu ma lnga brgya thams cad kyang gzhon nu mas bskor cing thabs gcig tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461a-0: @461a *// yang dag par thob pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du chos gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461a-4: yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461a-5: yang dus de'i tshe rgyal po kri kr'is mtshan gcig la rmi lam bcu rmis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461a-7: glang po che'i rgyal po skar khung nas byung ba na mjug ma phra mo thogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461a-8: sgom pa'i phyi nas khron pa snyegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461a-10: mu tig bre gang tshong byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461a-12: shing rin mnyam par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461a-13: kun dga' ra ba me tog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461a-14: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa ma byin par len pa rnams kyis phrogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461a-15: glang po phru gus spos kyi glang po 'jigs par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461a-16: spre'u mi gtsang bas gos pas gzhan la skud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461a-17: spre'u rgyal por dbang bskur bar mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461a-18: ras gcig mi bco brgyad kyis drangs kyang ma ral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461a-19: skye bo'i tshogs chen po gcig tu 'dus nas 'thab pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461a-22: 'tshang 'dru bar gyur pas 'jigs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461a-23: de nas rgyal po de sad pa dang 'jigs shing skrag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461a-24: skyo bas nga'i srog gi 'tsho ba'i bar chad du 'gyur ba'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461a-25: rgyal srid las nyams par mi 'gyur ram snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-0: des bram ze rmi ltas kyi mtshan ma ston @461b shes pa rnams bsdus nas de rnams la rmi lam de rnams smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-1: de rnams kyang gser phreng can la zhe sdang ba yin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-4: khyod la thams cad kyi nang na thugs su byon pa de'i snying dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-5: me la sbyin sreg gi mchod sbyin mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-6: de nas rgyal po de yi mug pas bsams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-7: thams cad kyi nang nang la sdug pa ni nga'i gser phreng can yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-8: gser phreng can gyis de thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-9: de yang mkhas pa yin pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-10: rgyal po de'i gan du song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-12: lha nyi ma shar na mar me'i 'od dgos pa ci mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-13: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'di drang srong smra ba ri dvags rgyu ba na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-14: der gshegs la zhus shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-15: bcom ldan 'das des khyed la lung ji ltar bsnyan pa de bzhin du khyed kyis gzung zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-16: de nas rgyal po kram kr'is grong khyer wa ra n'a sir nga deng bcom ldan 'das de'i grong du 'gro'o zhes dril chen po bsgrags nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-17: de 'khor brgya stong du ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-19: thabs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-21: chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-22: ji srid cig na rgyal po kri kr'i sta na las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:461b-23: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462a-3: 'dir bdag gung gcig la bdag gis rmi lam bcu khums pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462a-4: glang po che skar khung nas byung ba na de'i mjug ma thogs pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi rmi lam de'i 'bras bu 'dir bdag la lung bstan du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462a-9: khyod kyi yul 'khor nyams par mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462a-10: srog gi bar chad du yang mi 'gyur gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462a-12: gzhan du na ma 'ongs pa'i tshe skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462a-13: de'i phyi ma'i dus na nyan thos rnams lus ma bsdams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462a-16: shes rab ma bsdams pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462a-17: de rnams gnyen gyi tshogs spangs nas rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462a-18: de rnams gtsug lag khang rnams su khyim gyi 'du shes 'jog pas chags par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462a-19: glang po che skar khung nas byung ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462a-20: de'i mjug ma thogs pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462b-0: khyod kyis skom pa'i phyi nas khron pa snyegs pa rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni de rnams gtsug lag khang gi nang na lhan cig gnas pa rnams la chos ston @462b par 'gyur yang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462b-1: de rnams mnyan par 'dod par mi byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462b-3: de'i snga ltas ni 'di yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462b-5: khyod kyis phye bre gang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462b-6: mu tig bre gang tshong byed pa rmi lam du mthong bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni de nyid kyi nyan thos rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462b-7: gang bza' ba tsam gyi don du dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462b-9: byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che rnams yang dag par ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462b-10: de'i snga ltas ni 'di yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462b-13: shing mnyam por tshong byed par rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462b-14: de nyid kyi nyan thos rnams mu stegs kyi tshig gang yin pa rnams bzung nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462b-15: sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang snyoms par 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462b-16: de'i snga ltas ni de yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462b-18: khyod kyis kun dga' ra ba 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa ma byin par len pa rnams kyis phrogs pa rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni de nyid kyi nyan thos lus ma bsdams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462b-19: sems ma bsdams pa; tshul khrims ma bsdams pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462b-20: shes rab ma bsdams pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462b-21: de rnams dge 'dun rnams kyi me tog mchog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462b-22: 'bras bu'i mchog rnams 'tsho ba'i phyir dge 'dun las bcad nas khyim pa rnams la ster bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:462b-23: de'i snga ltas ni de yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463a-0: khyod kyis glang po phru gus spos kyi glang po 'jigs par byed @463a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463a-1: pa rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa 'di ni de nyid kyi nyan thos rnams tshul khrims 'chal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463a-2: sdig pa'i chos can de rnams gang dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463a-3: dge ba'i chos can rnams zil gyis gnon par byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463a-4: de'i snga ltas de yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463a-6: khyod kyis spre'u mi gtsang bas gos pas gzhan la skud par rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa 'di ni de nyid kyi nyan thos rnams tshul khrims 'chal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463a-7: sdig pa'i chos can rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463a-8: de rnams kyis tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la skur pa 'debs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463a-9: de'i snga ltas de yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463a-11: khyod kyis spre'u rgyal por dbang por dbang bskur bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni dus de'i tshe /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463a-12: rmongs pa rnams rgyal por dbang bskur bar 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463a-15: khyod kyis ras gcig mi bco brgyad kyi drangs kyang ma ral par rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463a-16: de nyid kyi bstan pa sde pa bco brgyad du gyes par gyur kyang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463a-17: rnam par grol ba'i ras ni ral bar bya ba mi nus par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463a-20: khyod kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po gcig tu 'dus nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463b-0: ma tshang 'dru bar rmi lam @463b du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni de nyid kyi bstan pa rtsod pas nub par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463b-3: de ltar mi bzad pa rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463b-4: gang bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la yang rgyal po kri kr'i dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463b-5: gser phreng can gyis thar ba'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463b-8: de'i tshe na gser phreng can gang yin pa de ni ma ga dha bzang mo 'di nyid yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463b-9: de'i tshe yang 'dis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463b-10: da ltar yang 'di 'ongs nas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463b-11: yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa; btsun pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463b-13: gser phreng can gyis las ci zhig bgyis na gser gyi phreng ba btags par skyes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463b-16: 'di nyid kyis las byas pa yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463b-17: sngon byung ba na zhing pa gzhan zhig gi chung mar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463b-18: rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten la kha dog sna tshogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis phreng ba byas nas btags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:463b-19: las de'i rnam par smin pas gser gyi phreng ba btags par skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:464a-0: de bas na dge slong dag las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin @464a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:464a-1: la; gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu dkar ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:464a-2: 'dres ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni 'dres ma'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:464a-4: de bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:464a-6: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la mngon par brtson par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:464a-7: dge slong dag khyed rnams kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:464a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:464a-9: dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:464a-10: ma ga dha bzang mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:464a-11: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharma shr'i bha dra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:464a-12: zhus chen gyi lo tstsha ba dge slong tshul khrims yon tan gyis bsgyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-075-004:464a-13: sgra sgyur gyi lo tstsha ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcos te gtan la phab pa ////
